title: Create appointment management app with time tracking and alarms

requirements.text: Create a data model for appointments with fields: title, description, date, time, duration, and alarm settings
acceptanceCriteria: Appointments can be stored with all required fields
Each appointment has a unique identifier
Date and time are stored in a structured format

requirements.text: Implement CRUD operations for appointments: create new appointment, retrieve all appointments, retrieve single appointment by ID, update existing appointment, and delete appointment
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create appointments with all fields
Users can view a list of all their appointments
Users can view details of a specific appointment
Users can update appointment information
Users can delete appointments

requirements.text: Create a calendar view interface showing appointments by date with visual indicators for upcoming appointments
acceptanceCriteria: Calendar displays current month with all dates
Dates with appointments are visually distinguished
Users can navigate between months
Clicking a date shows appointments for that day

requirements.text: Build an appointment creation and editing form with inputs for title, description, date picker, time picker, duration selector, and alarm settings
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required input fields
Date and time pickers are user-friendly
Form validates all inputs before submission
Users can save new appointments or update existing ones

requirements.text: Display a list view of all appointments sorted chronologically with options to filter by date range or search by title
acceptanceCriteria: List shows all appointments in chronological order
Each appointment displays key information (title, date, time)
Users can filter appointments by date range
Users can search appointments by title
Clicking an appointment opens details or edit view

requirements.text: Implement alarm functionality that checks for upcoming appointments and displays notifications when alarm time is reached
acceptanceCriteria: System checks for upcoming appointments based on alarm settings
Visual notifications appear when alarm triggers
Users can configure alarm timing (e.g., 15 minutes before, 1 hour before)
Notifications display appointment title and time

requirements.text: Create a dashboard view showing today's appointments, upcoming appointments in the next 7 days, and statistics (total appointments, upcoming count)
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays appointments for today prominently
Upcoming appointments for the next week are visible
Statistics show useful metrics about appointments
Dashboard provides quick access to create new appointment

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual design with a professional, organized aesthetic using warm neutrals (beige, cream, soft gray) as the base palette with sage green or muted teal accents, clean sans-serif typography, card-based layouts with subtle shadows, and calendar-inspired visual elements
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme is consistently applied across all views
Typography is readable and hierarchically organized
Layout feels organized and professional
UI elements have consistent spacing and styling
Calendar and time elements are prominent in the design

constraints: All appointments must be persisted in the backend
Alarm notifications must work within browser capabilities (no push notifications)
Time and date handling must account for user's local timezone
nonGoals: Integration with external calendar services (Google Calendar, Outlook)

required: Clean calendar icon illustration with minimal design in sage green on cream background (calendar-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Clock/alarm icon illustration with modern styling in muted teal (alarm-icon.dim_128x128.png)
